item.title: Pushpa composer Devi Sri Prasad gives update on Part 3 of Allu Arjun-starrer, says Sukumar is ‘reworking’ on story - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Update on Pushpa 3 from Composer Devi Sri Prasad

Date: Jan 15, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

The composer of the Pushpa franchise, Devi Sri Prasad, has provided insights regarding the development of Pushpa 3. The team is currently reworking the story based on the success of Pushpa 2.

  • Pushpa 2: The Rule has been a major box office success, grossing over ₹1,831 crore worldwide.
  • Sukumar is actively reworking the narrative for Pushpa 3, utilizing ideas from parts 1 and 2.
  • Audience reception has been remarkable, spanning various regions and languages including Telugu, Hindi, and Kannada.
“Based on the euphoria of Pushpa 2, Sukumar sir is working tirelessly with his passion... We have some fragments and ideas that will take shape as we move forward.” - Devi Sri Prasad

Pushpa 3 is eagerly anticipated following the massive success of its predecessors, although details remain sparse.

item.title: Dhoom 4: Ranbir locked, south star to play the villain - 123telugu
item.description:
Dhoom 4: Ranbir locked, south star to play the villain

Published on Jan 15, 2025 | Source: 123Telugu

The Dhoom franchise is being revived by Yash Raj Films, with reports indicating that Ranbir Kapoor will portray the main villain. Additionally, a popular South Indian star may also join the cast in a villainous role.

  • Ranbir Kapoor confirmed for the lead villain role in Dhoom 4.
  • Yash Raj Films is in talks with various actors for another villain role.
  • NTR Jr. is speculated to be in contention for the villain role.
  • Abhishek Bachchan and Uday Chopra will not return for this installment.
  • Ayan Mukerji is likely to direct the film.
“Fans are eager to see who will be cast in this big-budget action drama.”

With a strong buzz surrounding its casting and direction, Dhoom 4 promises to be an exciting installment in the franchise, captivating audiences once again.

item.title: Dhoom 4: Ranbir locked, south star to play the villain | Latest Telugu cinema news | Movie reviews | OTT Updates, OTT - 123telugu
item.description:
Dhoom 4: Ranbir locked, south star to play the villain

Published on Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Latest Telugu Cinema News

The prestigious Dhoom franchise is set to be revived, with reports confirming Ranbir Kapoor as the main villain and a popular South Indian star also being considered for a significant role.

  • Ranbir Kapoor cast as the main villain in Dhoom 4.
  • A popular South Indian star, rumored to be NTR Jr., is being considered for the villain role.
  • Yash Raj Films is in talks with multiple potential candidates for the villain character.
  • Speculation suggests Ayan Mukerji could direct Dhoom 4, having previously worked on Yash Raj Films' War.
  • Abhishek Bachchan and Uday Chopra's absence from this installment has raised fan curiosity about the casting.
“Fans are eager to see who will be cast in this big-budget action drama.”

The anticipation for Dhoom 4 grows as notable changes are mentioned, including the potential of high-profile cast announcements.

item.title: "XO, Kitty" Season 2 Soundtrack To Feature IVE, aespa, ENHYPEN, LE SSERAFIM, And More - soompi
item.description:
“XO, Kitty” Season 2 Soundtrack To Feature IVE, aespa, ENHYPEN, LE SSERAFIM, And More

Publication Date: January 14, 2024 Source: Rolling Stone

Netflix’s “XO, Kitty” has announced the Season 2 soundtrack, featuring an exciting lineup of K-pop artists.

  • The official track list was published by Rolling Stone on January 14.
  • Artists featured include IVE, aespa, ENHYPEN, and LE SSERAFIM.
  • Full list of songs includes hits from various artists, blending K-pop and international acts.
  • Season 2 is set to premiere on January 16, 2024.
“Watch IVE, aespa, ENHYPEN, LE SSERAFIM, and CRAVITY perform at the 2024 SBS Gayo Daejeon on Viki.”

This season promises to deliver an eclectic mix of music that reflects the vibrant K-pop scene.

item.title: Diljit Dosanjh Looks Helpless In Jail, Reads A Newspaper In New Photos From His Upcoming Movie - News18
item.description:
Diljit Dosanjh Looks Helpless In Jail, Reads A Newspaper In New Photos From His Upcoming Movie

Publication Date: January 15, 2025 Source: News18

Punjabi superstar Diljit Dosanjh has released new pictures from his upcoming movie, ‘Punjab ’95’, where he portrays human rights activist Jaswant Singh Khalra, showcasing intense moments of his character's journey.

  • Diljit shares images of his character inside a prison and reading newspapers outside, highlighting the emotional depth of his role.
  • The teaser of the film is set to be released on January 17, coinciding with the release of Kangana Ranaut’s film, ‘Emergency’.
  • The film addresses historical events connected to former Indian Prime Minister Indira Gandhi and its aftermath.
  • ‘Punjab ’95’ has already faced censorship challenges, with 120 cuts proposed by the Central Board of Film Certification.
  • Despite the film's sensitive subject matter, Diljit’s popularity is expected to help it reach audiences.
“The police were accused of killing unarmed suspects in staged shootouts.”

The production highlights the profound impact of political turmoil on individuals and relationships, aimed at shedding light on past human rights abuses.

item.title: 'Who wouldn't want': Siddharth Shivpuri on entering Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai - India Forums
item.description:
Siddharth Shivpuri Joins Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai as Roop Kumar

Published: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 1:56 PM | Source: Star Plus

Introduction: The popular show Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai has introduced a new character, Roop Kumar, played by Siddharth Shivpuri, aiming to bring a fresh angle to the storyline.

  • Roop Kumar is characterized as a smart and supportive individual stepping into Abhira's life during a difficult time.
  • His role is to help Abhira regain her confidence amidst ongoing drama.
  • Siddharth expressed his excitement about joining the show, mentioning his long-standing desire to work with Rajan Sir.
  • His entry is anticipated to add depth and excitement to the plot, drawing viewer interest.

I'm thrilled to work with Rajan Sir. I've wanted to collaborate with him for a long time, but things didn't align.

- Siddharth Shivpuri

Conclusion: Siddharth Shivpuri's entry as Roop Kumar is expected to introduce unexpected twists in the storyline, promising viewers a captivating experience in the upcoming episodes.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat takes an UNEXPECTED step as Savi refuses to give her UPSC exam - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Rajat takes an UNEXPECTED step as Savi refuses to give her UPSC exam

Published: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 1:13 PM

The latest episode of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin reveals Rajat's determination to help Savi, who struggles with her aspiration of becoming an IAS officer.

  • Rajat encourages Savi to pursue her dreams despite her reluctance.
  • Savi recalls traumatic memories linked to her past exams and wedding.
  • In a shocking act, Rajat creates a circle of fire around himself, insisting Savi must complete her mock test.
  • Savi grapples with overwhelming emotions while witnessing Rajat's commitment.
“Will Savi reconsider her decision to abandon the exam after witnessing her husband put his life on the line?”

This storyline marks a pivotal moment for Savi, possibly prompting her to embrace her dreams and recognize her love for Rajat.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunnam: Netizens curious about actresses who missed the lead role - 123telugu
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunnam: Netizens curious about actresses who missed the lead role

Published on Jan 15, 2025

Source: 123Telugu

With a lot of positive buzz and high expectations, Sankranthiki Vasthunnam, starring Victory Venkatesh, hit theaters yesterday, coinciding with the Pongal festival. Directed by Anil Ravipudi, the film has received great reviews, and its opening-day collections are impressive.

  • Victory Venkatesh stars in Sankranthiki Vasthunnam, which released during the Pongal festival.
  • Aishwarya Rajesh plays the role of Bhagyalakshmi, Venkatesh's wife, and her performance has resonated strongly with audiences.
  • Many netizens are curious about which actresses turned down the role, speculating it could have been a career-defining opportunity.
  • Aishwarya mentioned that 2-3 actresses declined the role, feeling grateful for the opportunity herself.
“Those actresses didn’t realize what they were missing.” - Aishwarya Rajesh

Netizens believe that the actresses who turned down the role may have missed out on something significant and are hoping for a revelation from the director in an upcoming interview.

item.title: Step inside Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma's luxurious Alibaug home, with temperature-controlled pool, it costs Rs... - India.com
item.description:
Step inside Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma's luxurious Alibaug home, with temperature-controlled pool, it costs Rs...

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: india.com

Virat Kohli and Anushka Sharma recently celebrated the 'griha-pravesh' of their new holiday home in Alibaug, complete with luxurious amenities such as a temperature-controlled pool.

  • The home is reported to have cost around Rs 32 crore, with the land purchased for Rs 19 crore and construction costing an additional Rs 13 crore.
  • It includes a bespoke kitchen, four bathrooms, a jacuzzi, and a sprawling garden.
  • The villa was designed by the globally acclaimed architecture firm SAOTA.
  • Features include high ceilings, natural materials, and expansive windows that frame breathtaking views.
  • One of the unique aspects of the home is its powder room with pink onyx marble counter-tops.
“Virat Kohli's Alibaug villa features a temperature-controlled pool, a bespoke kitchen, four bathrooms, a jacuzzi, a sprawling garden, covered parking, staff quarters and more.”

This luxurious residence not only reflects the couple's lifestyle but also showcases modern architecture blended with natural beauty, making it a perfect getaway from the bustle of city life.

item.title: Marco Box Office Collection Day 26: Unni Mukundan Only 27 Lakh Away To Deliver Last Mollywood Hit Of 2024! - Koimoi
item.description:
Marco Box Office Collection Day 26: Unni Mukundan Only 27 Lakh Away To Deliver Last Mollywood Hit Of 2024!

Date & Source: January 14, 2025 from Koimoi

Unni Mukundan starrer Marco continues to perform well at the box office, boosted by the Makar Sankranti holiday. As of Day 26, the film's total collection reaches 59.73 crore.

Budget & Recovery

The film was made on a budget of 30 crore and has garnered a remarkable 99.1% return on investment, nearing the hit label.

Key Box Office Details

  • Total needed for hit tag: 60 crore
  • Amount remaining: 27 lakh
  • Day 26 collection: 0.50 crore

Total Box Office Collection Breakdown

  • Week 1: 27.6 crore
  • Week 2: 16.3 crore
  • Week 3: 13.15 crore
  • 4th Tuesday: 0.50 crore

Total: 59.73 crore

Conclusion

With just 27 lakh to go, Marco is set to become the last Mollywood hit of 2024, highlighting the film's strong performance and audience engagement.

item.title: Balakrishna Set to Repeat His Winning Formula - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Balakrishna Set to Repeat His Winning Formula

Publication Date: Not provided Source: Track Tollywood

Balakrishna has enjoyed consecutive box office successes with his last four films and is now poised to collaborate again with the same directors for upcoming projects, starting with 'Akhanda 2'.

  • Balakrishna's last films include 'Akhanda', 'Veera Simha Reddy', 'Bhagavanth Kesari', and 'Daaku Maharaaj'.
  • He is working with the same four directors who helmed these successful films.
  • 'Akhanda 2' has already begun production and is set for release this Dasara season.
  • Director Gopichand Malineni will reunite with Balakrishna after his current project with Sunny Deol.
  • Anil Ravipudi and Bobby are also expected to collaborate with Balakrishna in the near future.

item.title: Keerthy Suresh talks about husband Antony Thattil's changed behaviour post marriage, says "Antony is... - Moneycontrol
item.description:
Keerthy Suresh talks about husband Antony Thattil's changed behaviour post marriage, says "Antony is not used to so much attention..."

Date: January 15, 2025 / Source: Moneycontrol

Keerthy Suresh recently shared insights into her relationship with Antony Thattil, discussing his transition into the public eye and how their bond has grown since their marriage.

  • The couple's relationship has evolved post-marriage.
  • Antony Thattil is adjusting to increased public attention.
  • Keerthy emphasizes the support they provide each other.
“Antony is not used to so much attention...”

The conversation highlights the challenges and joys of navigating public scrutiny in a marriage.

item.title: Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Collections: Venky starrer off to a blockbuster on first day - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Sankranthiki Vasthunam Box Office Collections: Venky's Blockbuster Opening

Published on: Jan 15, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Sankranthiki Vasthunam had a stellar opening at the Telugu box office, earning approximately Rs. 22 crore on its first day. The film attracted massive audiences, particularly in the Telugu states, marking a significant success for the production.

  • The film grossed around Rs. 22 crore on its first day.
  • Approximately Rs. 19 crore came from the Telugu states, with notable contributions from Telangana and Andhra Pradesh.
  • Initial audience reception is positive, indicating a strong family entertainer.
  • This successful opening offers significant relief to the producer after previous project losses.
  • The film sets an ambitious goal to surpass previous box office records for family entertainers.
“This will be the scene for the next couple of days with an extended holiday period in the twin states.”

This film marks a promising start for the Sankranti festival, echoing past successes and potentially reshaping box office expectations moving forward.

item.title: Akshay Kumar welcomes Tabu with a hug on Bhooth Bangla set as they reunite after 25 years - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Akshay Kumar and Tabu Reunite After 25 Years on Bhooth Bangla Set

Publication Date: 25th January 2025
Source: Bollywood Hungama

The much-anticipated horror comedy Bhooth Bangla sees Bollywood icons Akshay Kumar and Tabu reuniting after 25 years, promising an exciting collaboration for fans.

  • The film features an ensemble cast and is directed by Priyadarshan.
  • This marks the return of Akshay and Tabu, who previously starred together in hits like Hera Pheri.
  • Director Priyadarshan, known for cult comedies, reunites with the duo, increasing excitement for the film.
  • Bhooth Bangla is slated for theatrical release on 2nd April 2026.
“Some things get better and iconic with time!” - Priyadarshan on the reunion of Akshay Kumar and Tabu.

This reunion is a significant moment for fans of both actors, highlighting the nostalgic sentiments surrounding their collaboration.

item.title: Malti Marie turns 3! Nani Madhu Chopra wishes ‘light of our lives’. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Malti Marie turns 3! Nani Madhu Chopra wishes ‘light of our lives’. Watch

Publication Date: January 15, 2025

Source: Hindustan Times

Malti Marie, the daughter of Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas, celebrates her third birthday. Her grandmother, Madhu Chopra, shared a heartfelt birthday wish along with a video montage of personal moments.

  • Madhu Chopra posted a video on Instagram featuring unseen pictures of Malti.
  • In her caption, Madhu called Malti “the light of our lives” and wished her a magical birthday.
  • The video includes moments of Malti with her parents, including her father feeding her and her mother playing with her.
“Happy birthday to the light of our lives, Malti Marie (red heart emoji) May your birthday be as magical as you are!” - Madhu Chopra

Madhu’s heartfelt post garnered sweet wishes for Malti from fans and followers on social media.

item.title: Naga Chaitanya calls wife Sobhita Dhulipala his ‘Visakha queen’ on first Pongal after marriage; here’s what he means - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Naga Chaitanya calls wife Sobhita Dhulipala by a special name as they celebrate their first Pongal and Sankranti after marriage

Date: Jan 15, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Naga Chaitanya and Sobhita Dhulipala celebrate their first Pongal and Sankranti together after tying the knot in December 2024. Chaitanya shared a heartfelt post on Instagram, referring to Sobhita as his 'Visakha queen' in a tribute to her roots.

  • The couple married on December 4, 2024, in a private ceremony.
  • They celebrated their first Pongal together and shared intimate moments on social media.
  • Chaitanya mentioned his wife's hometown, Visakhapatnam, in his tribute.
“Panduga vibes with my Visakha queen @sobhitad.”

With love and shared traditions, the couple looks forward to their life together.

item.title: Squid Game Star Lee Jung Jae's Unedited Appearance Shocks Fans: 'He Aged Like That?' - News18
item.description:
Lee Jung Jae Shocks Fans with Unfiltered Appearance at Netflix Event

Date: January 15, 2025

Source: News18

South Korean actor Lee Jung Jae garnered attention for his return to Netflix's Squid Game Season 2, but his recent unfiltered appearance has sparked mixed reactions from fans.

  • Lee appeared at a Netflix event showcasing signs of aging, including visible wrinkles and fine lines.
  • His natural look contrasts sharply with the polished images typically seen in Squid Game.
  • Fans expressed shock on social media, with comments ranging from criticism to support for Lee's authentic appearance.
  • Despite mixed reactions, many defended the actor, emphasizing the reality of aging.
  • During the event, Lee spoke about new characters in the upcoming season and expressed his hopes for viewer engagement.
“Time is really scary,” remarked one fan, while another added, “He is 52. Of course he’s going to have some wrinkles; what’s the issue?”

Lee's unedited look has sparked important conversations about aging in the entertainment industry and the pressure of maintaining appearance.

item.title: Indian Army Day: Border 2 stars Sunny Deol, Varun Dhawan pay tributes, share pics with jawans - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Border 2 stars Sunny Deol and Varun Dhawan marked Indian Army Day

January 15, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

On January 15, stars Sunny Deol and Varun Dhawan paid heartfelt tributes to the Indian Army, sharing personal moments with soldiers and celebrating their bravery on social media.

  • Sunny Deol and Varun Dhawan celebrated Indian Army Day by honoring soldiers.
  • Sunny shared videos of his interactions with jawans, chanting patriotic slogans.
  • Varun posted pictures from the sets of Border 2, emphasizing the importance of the armed forces.
  • Border 2 is set for release in January 2026 and features a star-studded cast.
  • Sunny is also starring in another film, Jaat, scheduled for April 2025.
“Then, Now, and Forever Saluting the courage, sacrifice, and unwavering dedication of our heroes. Happy Indian Army Day!” – Sunny Deol

The tribute from both actors highlights the significance of Indian Army Day, recognizing the valiant efforts of the soldiers defending the nation.

item.title: This Bollywood star quit films at his peak to fight in Kargil War, lost 20 kg at the front serving Indian Army - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Bollywood Star Nana Patekar's Bravery During Kargil War

Date: Jan 15, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Nana Patekar, a celebrated Bollywood actor, put his acting career on hold to serve in the Kargil War, distinguishing himself as part of the Quick Response Team.

  • Nana Patekar lived and trained with the Indian Army for three years before the Kargil War.
  • He sought permission from Defense Minister George Fernandes to join the front lines during the war.
  • He served over two weeks near the Line of Control (LoC) and helped in medical cases as well.
  • Patekar dramatically lost 20 kg during his time at the front due to the severe conditions.
  • After returning, he resumed his successful acting career, most recently starring in the film Vanvaas.
“I was 76 kg when I reached Srinagar. By the time I came back, I was 56 kg.” - Nana Patekar

Nana Patekar's story exemplifies remarkable bravery and dedication, emphasizing the connection between art and national service.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Savi to save Sai after Ashika puts Sai in danger - India Forums
item.description:
Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Savi to Save Sai After Ashika Puts Sai in Danger

Published: Wednesday, January 15, 2025 at 9:12 AM

In a recent twist, Ashika stoops to a shocking low by putting her daughter, Sai, in danger. Savi and Rajat are faced with an intense situation as they rush to rescue Sai during a perilous ride.

  • Ashika re-enters Savi and Rajat's lives after betrayal and seeks reconciliation.
  • Savi is pregnant, and her bond with Rajat is growing stronger.
  • A dramatic turn occurs when Ashika endangers Sai, leading to a rescue by Savi and Rajat.
  • A new promo hints at more twists, including Kiaan going missing and a mysterious figure approaching him.
“With the promise of high-stakes drama and unexpected developments, Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin keeps its viewers eagerly anticipating what's next in this rollercoaster narrative.”

The show continues to captivate its audience with intense drama, keeping fans excited for future episodes.

item.title: Watch: Inside Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's Rs 32 Crore Plush Alibaug Bungalow With Temperature-Cont.. - NDTV Sports
item.description:
Watch: Inside Virat Kohli, Anushka Sharma's Rs 32 Crore Plush Alibaug Bungalow With Temperature-Controlled Pool

Publication Date: January 25, 2025 | Source: NDTV

Star cricketer Virat Kohli recently returned to Mumbai from his holiday home in Alibaug, showcasing a lavish property complete with luxury amenities.

  • The bungalow was built on an 8-acre plot acquired for approximately Rs 19 crore in 2022.
  • Spanning 10,000 square feet, it features a temperature-controlled pool, bespoke kitchen, four bathrooms, a jacuzzi, and a sprawling garden.
  • Kohli invested an estimated Rs 10.5 crore to Rs 13 crore in the construction of the villa, which showcases high-end materials including Italian marble.
  • Amidst his recent poor performance in cricket, there is speculation about Kohli and Anushka relocating to London in the future.
  • Kohli is included in the probables list for the last two fixtures of the Ranji Trophy, although his participation is doubtful.
“It is unlikely that he would participate in any of the two games.”

This luxurious home represents a significant investment for the couple and reflects their status in the celebrity sphere.
